adept.common

Class Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.Chunk
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommittedBelief, DiscourseUnit, EntityMention, EventPhrase, Opinion, PartOfSpeech, Passage, ProsodicPhrase, QuantifiedChunk, Sarcasm, Sentence, Session, Story, SyntacticChunk, TaggedChunk, TimePhrase, Utterance

    public class Chunk
extends HltContent
    The Class Chunk, which is a sequence of tokens that comprise a phrase or other syntactic unit within a sentence.
